WorkItem.Description:
Current Makefile requires tooling outside of bare JavaScript world. It would be great if the build system itself was self-hosted.

Similarly how tsc.js works in either Node.js or WScript, the build script should 'just work' regardless of the environment.

Comments.Message: Assigning to Jonathan who is managing our suggestions.
The build system is now based on Jake, which is an open source NPM package, so all build infrastructure is now JavaScript based and cross-platform.  Closing this issue.  Thanks!
